article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Molly Horan
article_metadata.description: President Obama got emotional talking about his oldest daughter's final first day of school.

og.description: Barack Obama is the president of the United States, commander of the biggest military on Earth, winner of the Nobel Prize…and a dad wondering how his daughter could possibly be old enough to be entering her senior year of high school. In a speech at Macomb County Community College in Michigan
og.title: Malia Obama Turned Her Dad Into A "Crybaby"
